headerDisplay: Control multiple Bosch Smart Home devices through room climate control of the BSHC API. Visit the repository readme for more information: https://github.com/fabiandev/homebridge-bosch-room-climate-control

host.title: Host
host.description: The host name / IP Address of BSHC (e.g. 192.168.0.10)

systemPassword.title: System password (plain text, only needed for pairing)
systemPassword.description: The system password of your Bosch Smart Home Controller (BSHC)

periodicUpdates.title: Refresh the accessory state after a specified amount of minutes (0 or lower = disabled)
periodicUpdates.description: The plugin reacts to changes of accessories, a periodic refresh is not required and does not disable event based updates through long polling

accessoryUpdates.title: Fetch devices and handle removed and added devices
accessoryUpdates.description: Fetch devices and handle removed and added devices. Without this being enabled, the plugin needs to be restarted to update accessories from the API.

clientName.title: Client name (leave empty to use plugin name)
clientName.description: The name for the homebridge client that is shown in the Bosch Smart Home app ('OSS ' prefix is added automatically)

clientId.title: Client identifier (leave empty for auto-generation)
clientId.description: Generated automatically if not provided ('oss_' prefix is added automatically)

clientCert.title: Client certificate (leave empty for auto-generation)
clientCert.description: base64 encoded content only without BEGIN/END

clientKey.title: Client private key (leave empty for auto-generation)
clientKey.description: base64 encoded content only without BEGIN/END, 2048bit
